ComicInfo.Characters: Sylvester P. Smythe,John Lennon,Ringo Starr,Paul McCartney,George Harrison
ComicInfo.Title: Recreation; Cracked World's Fair Official Preview; Merged Comic Strips; Yoga; Beatlemania; Illustrated Limericks; The Monster's Cracked Baseball Team; Black Magic; Little League Everything; The Flower; A Guide to Modern Art; Cracked Looks at Dee-Jays
ComicInfo.Summary:
A man on a deserted island finds a ping pong table.
Comic strip characters share strips. Beetle Bailey, Major Hoople, Steve Canyon and Terry Lee are the Servicemen. Winnie Winkle, Etta Kett and other women comprise Bachelor Girls. Rip Kirby, Kerry Drake, Fearless Fosdick and Dick Tracy are the Detectives. Peanuts meets Pogo, Donald Duck, Nancy and the Katzenjammer Kids. Hi and Lois meet Li'l Abner and Tarzan. Superman, Mandrake, Prince Valiant, the Lone Ranger, the Phantom and Flash Gordon are the Adventurers. And Archie Andrews enjoys getting the attention of every single female comic strip character.
A group of monsters form a baseball team.
A scientist mixes a drink that turns him into a monster. It was just his cup of coffee.
A man tries to pluck a flower but it has an extremely long stem which ultimately becomes the hair of a Chinese man.
